instruction: You are Michelle Brooks (CustomerId: 18) and you want to update Invoice #341. Please remove the track 'King Of Dreams' (TrackId: 798) from the invoice and instead add the track 'Ramble On' (TrackId: 1633) to the same invoice, with quantity 1 and unit price 0.99.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 341 AND TrackId = 798;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (341, 1633, 0.99, 1);

instruction: My name is Ellie Sullivan, CustomerId 33, from Yellowknife, NT, Canada. Please help me update my Invoice #214 (InvoiceId: 214): 1) Remove 'All I Really Want' (TrackId: 38) from this invoice, and 2) add the track 'Plaster Caster' (TrackId: 1563) with UnitPrice 0.99 and Quantity 1 to the same invoice. Confirm you will do ONLY these changes to InvoiceId 214 and nothing else.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 214 AND TrackId = 38;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (214, 1563, 0.99, 1);

instruction: You are Marc Dubois (CustomerId 41) from Lyon. For invoice #346 (InvoiceId 346), you want to remove the song 'Acelerou' (TrackId 875) as it was purchased by mistake, and you want a refund. Please update the invoice by: (1) deleting the invoice line for TrackId 875; (2) inserting a new invoice line for this invoice with a negative UnitPrice to record the refund (InvoiceId 346, TrackId 875, UnitPrice -0.99, Quantity 1); (3) updating the Invoice total to reflect this refund (subtract 0.99 from its previous Total).

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 346 AND TrackId = 875;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (346, 875, -0.99, 1);
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = Total - 0.99 WHERE InvoiceId = 346;

instruction: You are Manoj Pareek and your registered email is manoj.pareek@rediff.com. You recently moved, so you need all your past invoices where your billing address is '12,Community Centre', billing city is 'Delhi', and postal code is '110017', to be updated so that the BillingAddress is now '15, Community Avenue', BillingCity remains 'Delhi', and BillingPostalCode remains '110017'. But you immediately realize the correct street should be '15, Community Ave' (remove 'nue' at the end), and want to update all these invoices to '15, Community Ave' instead. Please perform both actions for all your invoices with those matching fields.

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'manoj.pareek@rediff.com';
UPDATE Invoice SET BillingAddress = '15, Community Avenue' WHERE CustomerId = 58 AND BillingAddress = '12,Community Centre' AND BillingCity = 'Delhi' AND BillingPostalCode = '110017';
UPDATE Invoice SET BillingAddress = '15, Community Ave' WHERE CustomerId = 58 AND BillingAddress = '15, Community Avenue' AND BillingCity = 'Delhi' AND BillingPostalCode = '110017';

instruction: My name is Madalena Sampaio, CustomerId 35. In my invoice #355, I'd like to replace the track 'For the Greater Good of God' that I originally bought in the Protected AAC audio file version (InvoiceLineId 1924, TrackId 1208, MediaTypeId 2) with the MPEG audio file version (TrackId 1209, MediaTypeId 1) of the same song and album. Please remove the invoice line 1924 and add a new invoice line for InvoiceId 355 with TrackId 1209, UnitPrice 0.99, Quantity 1.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE CustomerId = 35 AND FirstName = 'Madalena' AND LastName = 'Sampaio'
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1924 AND InvoiceId = 355 AND TrackId = 1208
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (355, 1209, 0.99, 1)

instruction: You are Diego Gutiérrez (CustomerId 56), and you wish to update your trade records. First, update the billing address on your latest invoice (InvoiceId 403) to '123 Avenida Corrientes, Buenos Aires, 1107, Argentina'. Second, remove the track 'Polícia (Vinheta)' (TrackId 2799, InvoiceLineId 2186) from this invoice. Third, add the track 'It Was A Very Good Year' (TrackId 1048, UnitPrice 0.99, Quantity 1) to the same invoice. Finally, inform me of the new total for invoice #403 after these updates.

actions.sql: UPDATE Invoice SET BillingAddress = '123 Avenida Corrientes', BillingCity = 'Buenos Aires', BillingCountry = 'Argentina', BillingPostalCode = '1107' WHERE InvoiceId = 403 AND CustomerId = 56
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 2186 AND InvoiceId = 403 AND TrackId = 2799
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (403, 1048, 0.99, 1)
SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) as NewTotal FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 403

instruction: I'm Mark Taylor (CustomerId: 55) and I realized I accidentally purchased '09 - Iron Maiden' (TrackId: 1276) on Invoice #250. That line item has InvoiceLineId 1359. I meant to buy two copies of 'Fear Of The Dark' (TrackId: 1267, InvoiceLineId: 1358) instead. Please remove InvoiceLineId 1359 from Invoice #250 and update InvoiceLineId 1358's Quantity from 1 to 2. Make sure to recalculate the Invoice #250 total afterwards.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1359 AND InvoiceId = 250 AND TrackId = 1276;
UPDATE InvoiceLine SET Quantity = 2 WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1358 AND InvoiceId = 250 AND TrackId = 1267;
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 250) WHERE InvoiceId = 250;

instruction: I am Eduardo Martins (eduardo@woodstock.com.br). I would like to update my past order #154 by removing the track 'No Quarter' (TrackId: 1601) from this invoice and instead adding the track 'Down Under' (TrackId: 1791) to it. Please update the invoice lines for InvoiceId 154 accordingly. Make sure to remove InvoiceLineId 836 (which corresponds to TrackId 1601 in InvoiceId 154) and then create a new InvoiceLine with InvoiceId 154, TrackId 1791, UnitPrice 0.99, and Quantity 1.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'eduardo@woodstock.com.br';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 836 AND InvoiceId = 154 AND TrackId = 1601;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (154, 1791, 0.99, 1);

instruction: My name is Johannes Van der Berg and my email is johavanderberg@yahoo.nl. Please permanently remove the entire order with InvoiceId 258 from my history, including all its tracks and details.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE FirstName = 'Johannes' AND LastName = 'Van der Berg' AND Email = 'johavanderberg@yahoo.nl';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 258;
DELETE FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceId = 258 AND CustomerId = 48;

instruction: My name is Julia Barnett and my email is jubarnett@gmail.com. I want to clean up my playlists: Please move every track composed by 'Chris Cornell' that is currently in my 'Music' playlist (PlaylistId 8) to my 'Grunge' playlist (PlaylistId 16) instead, and also remove them from the 'Music' playlist. Please only perform this change for tracks currently composed by 'Chris Cornell' and in the 'Music' playlist.

actions.sql: SELECT TrackId FROM Track WHERE Composer = 'Chris Cornell';
SELECT TrackId FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8;

INSERT INTO PlaylistTrack (PlaylistId, TrackId) SELECT 16, TrackId FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8 AND TrackId IN (SELECT TrackId FROM Track WHERE Composer = 'Chris Cornell') AND TrackId NOT IN (SELECT TrackId FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 16);
DELETE FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8 AND TrackId IN (SELECT TrackId FROM Track WHERE Composer = 'Chris Cornell');

instruction: I am Kathy Chase (kachase@hotmail.com, 801 W 4th Street, Reno, NV 89503). I accidentally purchased the track 'Yesterdays' (TrackId: 1176) twice in different orders. Please refund me for the first purchase and update Invoice #38 by removing 'Yesterdays' (InvoiceLineId: 197, InvoiceId: 38, UnitPrice: 0.99, Quantity: 1), and adjust the invoice total by subtracting $0.99.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'kachase@hotmail.com' AND Address = '801 W 4th Street' AND City = 'Reno' AND State = 'NV' AND PostalCode = '89503';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 197 AND InvoiceId = 38 AND TrackId = 1176;
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = Total - 0.99 WHERE InvoiceId = 38;

instruction: Hi! This is Patrick Gray (patrick.gray@aol.com). I just moved to a new home and would like to update my address and phone number in your records. Please change my address to '2100 E Speedway Blvd, Tucson, AZ 85719', my phone to '+1 (520) 555-6789', and ensure that all of my past invoices show the updated address. My previous address was '1033 N Park Ave, Tucson, AZ 85719'. Thank you!

actions.sql: SELECT CustomerId FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'patrick.gray@aol.com';
UPDATE Customer SET Address = '2100 E Speedway Blvd', City = 'Tucson', State = 'AZ', Country = 'USA', PostalCode = '85719', Phone = '+1 (520) 555-6789' WHERE CustomerId = 27;
UPDATE Invoice SET BillingAddress = '2100 E Speedway Blvd', BillingCity = 'Tucson', BillingState = 'AZ', BillingCountry = 'USA', BillingPostalCode = '85719' WHERE CustomerId = 27;

instruction: I am Daan Peeters (daan_peeters@apple.be). I'm moving to a new place and want to update my profile address to 'Vanderlindenlaan 17', Brussels, Belgium, postal code '1020'. Please also update my most recent invoice (InvoiceId: 371) so the billing address matches this new address and postal code. Then, for that invoice, I accidentally purchased the track 'Save The Children' (TrackId: 1786) and would like it removed from the invoice. The CustomerId is 8, the InvoiceId is 371, the new address is 'Vanderlindenlaan 17', the new postal code is '1020', and the TrackId to remove is 1786.

actions.sql: UPDATE Customer SET Address = 'Vanderlindenlaan 17', PostalCode = '1020' WHERE CustomerId = 8;
UPDATE Invoice SET BillingAddress = 'Vanderlindenlaan 17', BillingPostalCode = '1020' WHERE InvoiceId = 371;
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 371 AND TrackId = 1786;

instruction: I am Niklas Schröder (CustomerId: 38, email: nschroder@surfeu.de). I want to remove the track 'Everything's Ruined' (TrackId: 940) from my 'Music' playlist (PlaylistId: 8), and then update this track's genre from 'Alternative & Punk' (GenreId: 4) to 'Rock' (GenreId: 1). Please perform both these changes.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8 AND TrackId = 940;
UPDATE Track SET GenreId = 1 WHERE TrackId = 940;

instruction: You are Heather Leacock (hleacock@gmail.com). For InvoiceId 375, remove TrackId 1829, replace TrackId 1841 with TrackId 3015, and add TrackId 93 and TrackId 147. Please update all invoice line items accordingly to reflect these changes.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId = 375 AND TrackId = 1829;
UPDATE InvoiceLine SET TrackId = 3015, UnitPrice = 0.99, Quantity = 1 WHERE InvoiceId = 375 AND TrackId = 1841;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (375, 93, 0.99, 1);
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (375, 147, 0.99, 1);

instruction: You are Puja Srivastava (email: puja_srivastava@yahoo.in) from Bangalore. You noticed you accidentally purchased 'Night Train' (TrackId 1416) in your Invoice #45 (InvoiceId 45). You want to exchange this track for 'Jeru' (TrackId 598), which is also priced at $0.99, in the same invoice. Please remove the InvoiceLine with InvoiceLineId 237 (Night Train), and add a new InvoiceLine for TrackId 598 at UnitPrice 0.99 and Quantity 1 to InvoiceId 45. Ensure the total invoice amount remains unchanged.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE FirstName = 'Puja' AND LastName = 'Srivastava' AND Email = 'puja_srivastava@yahoo.in';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 237 AND InvoiceId = 45 AND TrackId = 1416;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (45, 598, 0.99, 1);

instruction: I am František Wichterlová (CustomerId: 5, email frantisekw@jetbrains.com). For my most recent invoice (#306 dated 2012-09-05), I want to remove the track 'Unchained' (InvoiceLineId: 1656, TrackId: 3069) and add the track 'Slither' (TrackId: 3114) instead, at a unit price of 0.99 and quantity 1.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'frantisekw@jetbrains.com';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 1656 AND InvoiceId = 306 AND TrackId = 3069;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (306, 3114, 0.99, 1);

instruction: I am Jennifer Peterson (CustomerId: 15). On my invoice from July 16, 2009 (InvoiceId: 47), I mistakenly purchased the track 'Stone Free' by Jimi Hendrix (TrackId: 1491, InvoiceLineId: 250, UnitPrice: 0.99). Please remove this track from my invoice and update the invoice total to reflect the new sum. The current total is 13.86 and should be adjusted after this track is deleted.

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId = 250 AND InvoiceId = 47 AND TrackId = 1491 AND UnitPrice = 0.99;
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = 13.86 - 0.99 WHERE InvoiceId = 47 AND CustomerId = 15;

instruction: Hi, I am Richard Cunningham (ricunningham@hotmail.com). I purchased the tracks 'American Idiot' (TrackId: 1133) and 'Whatsername' (TrackId: 1145), both by Green Day, and they were accidentally added to my 'Music' playlist (PlaylistId: 8) instead of my 'Alternative & Punk' playlist (PlaylistId: 15). Please remove these two tracks (TrackId 1133 and 1145) from PlaylistId 8 and add both to PlaylistId 15.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'ricunningham@hotmail.com';
DELETE FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8 AND TrackId = 1133;
DELETE FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = 8 AND TrackId = 1145;
INSERT INTO PlaylistTrack (PlaylistId, TrackId) VALUES (15, 1133);
INSERT INTO PlaylistTrack (PlaylistId, TrackId) VALUES (15, 1145);

instruction: You're Luis Rojas (CustomerId=57, email luisrojas@yahoo.cl) from Santiago, Chile. You purchased the tracks 'Good Golly Miss Molly' (TrackId=698) and 'Wrote A Song For Everyone' (TrackId=700) on Invoice #22 and discovered they're duplicates of songs you already own. You want to swap both for 'The Crunge' (TrackId=1598) and 'The Ocean' (TrackId=1602) by Led Zeppelin (both $0.99 each), all on InvoiceId=22. Please remove InvoiceLineId 115 (TrackId=698) and 116 (TrackId=700) from InvoiceId=22, add InvoiceLine entries for TrackId=1598 and 1602 to InvoiceId=22 (each with UnitPrice=0.99 and Quantity=1), and update InvoiceId=22 Total accordingly. Confirm updated invoice total and new track details after the swap.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Email='luisrojas@yahoo.cl';
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId=115 AND InvoiceId=22 AND TrackId=698;
DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId=116 AND InvoiceId=22 AND TrackId=700;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (22, 1598, 0.99, 1);
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (22, 1602, 0.99, 1);
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId=22) WHERE InvoiceId=22;
SELECT il.InvoiceLineId, il.TrackId, t.Name, il.UnitPrice, il.Quantity FROM InvoiceLine il JOIN Track t ON il.TrackId = t.TrackId WHERE il.InvoiceId = 22;
SELECT Total FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceId=22;

instruction: You are Stanisław Wójcik (CustomerId=49). On your Invoice #282 (InvoiceId=282), you were charged for the track 'It's Late' (TrackId=2280, InvoiceLineId=1523) in error. Please remove that track from the invoice, and instead add the track 'So Beautiful' (TrackId=2446, UnitPrice=0.99, Quantity=1) to the same invoice. After making this change, recalculate and update the invoice total (InvoiceId=282) to reflect the correct sum for the remaining tracks (each at 0.99).

actions.sql: DELETE FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceLineId=1523 AND InvoiceId=282 AND TrackId=2280;
INSERT INTO InvoiceLine (InvoiceId, TrackId, UnitPrice, Quantity) VALUES (282, 2446, 0.99, 1);
UPDATE Invoice SET Total = (SELECT SUM(UnitPrice*Quantity) FROM InvoiceLine WHERE InvoiceId=282) WHERE InvoiceId=282;
